name: Twitch.tv | Stretchy twitchy livestream (redesign)
description: A userstyle for Twitch.tv's new design. Deletes right bar and gives the livestream/video a lot more space in a channel. And hey, the chat is still at the right side! Amazing, isn't it?
additional_info:
Instructions: just go to your favourite livestream and watch it just a little bigger than normally, with the chat on the side!

Release notes: this is my first time making an userstyle, so please give feedback. (Version 1ne)
